label: 8-epi-PGF2a in urine
definition: Concentration of 8-epi-prostaglandin F2 alpha in urine
method: Liquid Chromatography-Tandem Mass Spectrometry (LC-MS/MS)|Gas Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry (GC-MS)

label: Activity LP-PLA2 in blood
definition: Measurement of the activity of the Lp-PLA2 (lipoprotein-associated phospholipase A2) enzyme in serum or plasma.

label: Apnea-Hypopnea Index
definition: Measurement used to diagnose and assess the severity of sleep apnea. It is calculated by counting the number of apneas and hypopneas that occur per hour of sleep.
calculated from: total breathing pauses (apneas) and shallow breaths (hypopneas) lasting at least 10 seconds, then dividing that total by your total hours of sleep
Anne's notes: unsure of the attribute for "concentration" when the denominator is time

label: Albumin creatinine ratio in urine
definition: Measurement of the ratio of albumin to creatinine in urine.

definition: Measurement of albumin in blood serum

definition: Concentration of albumin in urine

definition: Concentration of ALT in the blood.

definition: Concentration of AST SGOT in blood. AST (aspartate aminotransferase) is typically measured in serum or plasma.

definition: Concentration of total bilirubin in blood, typically measured in serum or plasma

label: BMI
definition: Also known as body mass index: ratio of a person's weight in kilos to the square of their height in meters

label: BNP
definition: Concentration of BNP in blood, typically measured in plasma or whole blood. Also known as B-type natriuretic peptide, a hormone.

label: Body weight
definition: Mass of a person or other organism

label: BUN
definition: Concentration of blood urea nitrogen in blood, typically measured in serum or plasma

definition: Ratio of blood urea nitrogen (BUN) to creatinine in blood, typically measured in serum or plasma

definition: Concentration of c-reactive protein (CRP) in blood, typically measured in serum or plasma

label: CAC Score
definition: The Coronary Artery Calcium Score is a measure of the amount of calcium in the arteries of the heart. Measured from a CT Scan.

label: CAC volume
definition: Volume of coronarty artery calcium in the arteries of the heart. Measured by CT Scan.

label: Carotid IMT
definition: Carotid intima-media thickness (IMT) measures the thickness of the inner two layers (intima and media layers) of the carotid artery walls - there are many ways to take this measurement

label: Carotid stenosis left
definition: Relative measure of the narrowing of the left carotid artery in the neck

label: Carotid stenosis right
definition: Relative measure of the narrowing of the right carotid artery in the neck

diagnosis method: post-mortem examination|procedures and diagnoses before death

label: PR interval
definition: Time it takes for electrical impulses to travel from the atria to the ventricles of the heart. Measured using ECG/EKG
measurement_ofs: electrical impulse to travel from the heart's upper chambers (atria) to the lower chambers (ventricles)
calculated from: start of the P wave to the beginning of the QRS complex
instrument: MACPC electrocardiograph

label: QRS interval
definition: Time that elapses from the beginning of the Q wave to the end of the S wave. Measured using ECG/EKG
calculated from: start of the Q wave to the end of the S wave
instrument: MACPC electrocardiograph

label: QT interval
definition: Time it takes for the ventricles of the heart to depolarize and repolarize. Measured using ECG/EKG
measurement_ofs: heart's ventricles to contract (depolarize) and relax (repolarize)
calculated from: start of the QRS complex to the end of the T wave
instrument: MACPC electrocardiograph
